# ReconciliationFlags enumeration

```csharp
public enum ReconciliationFlags : byte
```

## Values

| name | value | description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| CLEARED | `99` | The Split has been cleared (c) |
| RECONCILED | `121` | The Split has been reconciled (y) |
| FROZEN | `102` | frozen into accounting period (f) |
| NEW | `110` | not reconciled or cleared (n) |
| VOID | `118` | split is void (v) |
